View Javadoc
1   package com.test.vendor.derby;
2   
3   import com.jsql.model.InjectionModel;
4   import com.jsql.model.exception.JSqlException;
5   import com.jsql.view.terminal.SystemOutTerminal;
6   import org.junit.jupiter.api.AfterEach;
7   import org.junit.jupiter.api.Assertions;
8   import org.junitpioneer.jupiter.RetryingTest;
9   
10  public class DerbyUnionGetSuiteIT extends ConcreteDerbySuiteIT {
11      
12      @Override
13      public void setupInjection() throws Exception {
14          InjectionModel model = new InjectionModel();
15          this.injectionModel = model;
16  
17          model.subscribe(new SystemOutTerminal());
18  
19          model.getMediatorUtils().getParameterUtil().initQueryString(
20              "http://localhost:8080/union?tenant=derby&name="
21          );
22          
23          model
24          .getMediatorUtils()
25          .getConnectionUtil()
26          .withMethodInjection(model.getMediatorMethod().getQuery())
27          .withTypeRequest("GET");
28          
29          model.getMediatorVendor().setVendorByUser(model.getMediatorVendor().getDerby());
30          model.beginInjection();
31      }
32      
33      @Override
34      @RetryingTest(3)
35      public void listDatabases() throws JSqlException {
36          super.listDatabases();
37      }
38      
39      @Override
40      @RetryingTest(3)
41      public void listTables() throws JSqlException {
42          super.listTables();
43      }
44      
45      @Override
46      @RetryingTest(3)
47      public void listColumns() throws JSqlException {
48          super.listColumns();
49      }
50      
51      @Override
52      @RetryingTest(3)
53      public void listValues() throws JSqlException {
54          super.listValues();
55      }
56  
57      @AfterEach
58      public void afterEach() {
59          Assertions.assertEquals(
60              this.injectionModel.getMediatorStrategy().getUnion(),
61              this.injectionModel.getMediatorStrategy().getStrategy()
62          );
63      }
64  }
